name: Buraq
description: The Buraq is a celestial creature, notable for its grace and power, resembling a majestic steed with radiant energy emanating from its form.
memorable: The Buraq has magical attacks that deal additional radiant damage, and it possesses the ability to teleport and perceive nonmagical darkness.
goals: To serve as a protector and ally to champions of good.
relations: Often encountered with paladins or good-aligned adventurers.
environment: Typically found outdoors, particularly in areas where its natural abilities can be best utilized at night.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma, magical resistance, and immunity to certain conditions make it a versatile ally in combat.
weaknesses: None notably highlighted; strong resistances to many common threats.
attacks: Strikes with hooves delivering bludgeoning and radiant damage, making it a formidable attacker.
most_powerful_ability: Night Journey allows the Buraq to teleport frequently while in darkness, enhancing its strategic options.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through magical darkness and perceive hidden threats.
skills: Excels in History and Religion, reflecting its celestial nature and knowledge.
additional_information: Angelic Weapons enhance its attacks with extra radiant damage.
The Buraq can cast various utility and protective spells.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can carry a rider as a Large creature for the purpose of carrying capacity.
Immunity to charmed, exhaustion, and frightened conditions.
spellcasting: Can cast various spells at will, including defensive and mobility-enhancing spells.
test_queries: graceful flying mount with radiant powers
magical steed immune to charming effects
